mainText:
I never got to meet Steve Jobs. I did anticipate it though.
I am a twelve year old boy. A twelve year old boy who did not wait to start working on my contribution to the world. I am a member of the iOS and Mac developer programs because of Steve Jobs. It is because of him that I anticipate coming home from school to take courses online and learn even more. It is because of him that I am in the process of founding my own app development company. I own and have owned many of his products because of him. He inspired the world, he changed the world. And just as effectively, changed and effected me.
author: Drew
